author: Megan Ellis
title: Watch: Hippos vs...shark?!
text:
Watch: Hippos vs...shark?! Wed, 14 Oct 2015 6:38 PM Share Your Email Credit: GS Features/YouTube 
This sounds like more of a strange movie mash up rather than something which actually happened - a faceoff between a shark and hippos. 
That's right, a brave (albeit small) shark decided it wanted to investigate a family of hippos. 
The curious interaction occurred at the iSimangaliso Wetland Park in KwaZulu-Natal. 
Tour operator Stacey Farrell captured footage of the incident. 
The video shows the bull shark swimming very close to the hippos, finally thrashing at one of them. The hippos seem relatively unperturbed by the shark, occasionally having a look at the creature. 
However, they then decide enough is enough and begin to lunge and thrash at the shark. The shark however manages to escape. 
According to Farrell, bull sharks can live in both salt and freshwater - explaining the shark's presence in the estuary.
